data.eml:eml: Another alien terrestrial planarian in the United Kingdom: Australopacifica atrata (Steel, 1897) (Platyhelminthes: Tricladida: Continenticola)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jones, Hugh D. (2019): Another alien terrestrial planarian in the United Kingdom: Australopacifica atrata (Steel, 1897) (Platyhelminthes: Tricladida: Continenticola). Zootaxa 4604 (3): 575-587, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4604.3.12
